title: Naturgy Swings to 9-Months Net Profit Despite Lower Sales
text:
By Carlo Martuscelli

Naturgy Energy Group SA (NTGY.MC) said Wednesday that it swung to a net profit in the first nine months of the year, as it benefited from lower impairment charges, despite a decrease in sales.

The Spanish energy company said quarterly profit totaled 901 million euros ($999.9 million), compared with a loss of EUR3.04 billion a year earlier. Naturgy said that expenses from depreciation, amortization and impairments totaled EUR1.19 billion in the period, down sharply from EUR5.54 billion.

Net sales slid 3.2% to EUR17.11 billion, a result it attributed to lower energy prices and volumes in its liberalized businesses, which weren't offset by growth in the infrastructure businesses.

Write to Carlo Martuscelli at carlo.martuscelli@dowjones.com; @carlomartu

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

October 30, 2019 04:17 ET (08:17 GMT)
